item.title: Wow this is the coolest shit you will ever see
item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

THEY NEVER SHOW THE WHOLE SHOT. ITS A FAKE HAND WHEN ITS UP CLOSE AND THEN IT SHOWS HIM "PAINTING" FROM FAR AWAY. "PAINTING" AS IN SLAPPING THE PAPER WITH HIS HANDS. FAKE FAKE FAKE
QFT

item.title: Wow this is the coolest shit you will ever see
item.dc:creator: @MybBob MybBob
item.description:
@MybBob wrote:

[quote=“P I M P 3 D Tut, post:6, topic:108456”][quote author=zoltanman link=topic=155253.msg1460157#msg1460157 date=1181464984]

What if the adult ate lots of steak?

you won’t be to over weight from steak, most likely Junk food. but even that, he wouldn’t be able to paint if he was to fat?
[/quote]
lols
true.
If you were fat.
You could hardly move :s[/quote]

Lets ask starblaster

What if the adult ate lots of steak?

i dunno lol

zoltanman:

Eh I think the people that thought it was fake, was actually wrong. I mean that hand looks more a less the exact same hand of the kid. So it couldn’t have been an adult with those baby fat hands. Eh that’s just my opinion.

i dunno what to think =]
just posting cuz i thought it was kool
